# NSWritingToolsBehavior.complete

**Case**

An option to provide the complete Writing Tools experience for the text view.

## Declaration

```swift
case complete
```

## Getting the Writing Tools behaviors

- **NSWritingToolsBehavior.none**: An option to prevent Writing Tools from modifying the text in the view.
- **NSWritingToolsBehavior.default**: An option to let the system determine the best way to enable Writing Tools for the view.
- **NSWritingToolsBehavior.limited**: An option to provide a limited, overlay-panel experience for the text view.
